 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשֵׁיזַבְאֵל‎</span> **proper name, masculine** ==Jewish name in Persian period== (***God delivers***; from Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שֵׁיזֵיב‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***deliver***, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šûzubu***</u></abbr>, Shaph\`el from <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ezêbu***</u></abbr>, ***deliver***, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 35</sup>; compare the Babylonian names <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Mušizib-Marduk***</u></abbr>, 'Marduk delivers,' <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Mušizib-ílu***</u></abbr>, [[BDB#Schr|KB]]<sup>ii. 281, iv. 129</sup>): — grandfather of one of the wall-builders [[Neh.3.4|Neh 3:4]] one of those sealed [[Neh.10.22|Neh 10:22]] father of royal officer (a Judaean) [[Neh.11.24|Neh 11:24]] the relation of these to each other is unknown; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Μασεζεβηα</span>, <span class="bdbLangGreek">Μεσωζεβηλ</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">Μασσιζαβελ</span>, etc.
